verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> shir A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold מַה־ <WH4100> mah- how טּ֭וֹב <WH2896> Tov Behold how good וּמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- and how נָּעִ֑ים <WH5273> na-'Im; and how pleasant שֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> She-vet to dwell אַחִ֣ים <WH251> 'a-Chim [it is] for brethren גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- again יָֽחַד׃ <WH3162> Ya-chad. together

כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן <WH8081> kash-She-men ointment הַטּ֨וֹב׀ <WH2896> hat-Tov [It is] like the precious עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הָרֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh, upon the head יֹרֵ֗ד <WH3381> yo-Red, that ran down עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הַזָּקָ֥ן <WH2206> haz-za-Kan upon the beard זְקַֽן־ <WH2206> ze-kan- beard אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron; [even] Aaron's שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד <WH3381> yo-Red, that went down עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon פִּ֥י <WH6310> pi to the skirts מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4060> mid-do-Tav. of his garments

כְּטַל־ <WH2919> ke-tal- As the dew חֶרְמ֗וֹן <WH2768> cher-Mon, of Hermon שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ <WH3381> shei-yo-Red [and as the dew] that descended עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon הַרְרֵ֪י <WH2042> har-Rei upon the mountains צִ֫יּ֥וֹן <WH6726> tzi-Yon of Zion כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki For שָׁ֨ם׀ <WH8033> sham there צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh for there the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַבְּרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> hab-be-ra-Chah; the blessing חַ֝יִּ֗ים <WH2416> chai-Yim, [even] life עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ha-'o-Lam. for evermore
